words.source: H559 (אָמַר, qal wayyiqtol 3ms) with conjunctive waw; KJV/ESV/NASB 'he said'
H1323 (בַּת, noun common feminine plural construct + 3ms suffix); KJV/ESV/NASB 'his daughters'
H346 (אַיֵּה, interrogative + 3ms suffix) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'where is he', ESV 'where is he', NASB 'where is he then'
H4100 (מָה, interrogative) with preposition lamed; KJV 'why is it that', ESV 'why', NASB 'why'
H2088 (זֶה, demonstrative pronoun masculine singular); KJV/ESV/NASB implied in 'why is it that'
H5800 (עָזַב, qal perfect 2fp); KJV 'ye have left', ESV 'you have left', NASB 'you have left'
H853 (אֵת, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H376 (אִישׁ, noun common masculine singular absolute) with article; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the man'
H7121 (קָרָא, qal imperative 2fp); KJV 'call him', ESV 'call him', NASB 'invite him'
H398 (אָכַל, qal jussive 3ms) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'that he may eat', ESV 'that he may eat', NASB 'to eat'
H3899 (לֶחֶם, noun common masculine singular absolute); KJV 'bread', ESV 'bread', NASB 'food'
